thread.title: BRIEF-Jaguar Health Says Entered Securities Purchase Agreement With Chicago Venture Partners - SEC Filing​

title: BRIEF-Jaguar Health Says Entered Securities Purchase Agreement With Chicago Venture Partners - SEC Filing​

organizations.name: brief-jaguar health says entered securities purchase agreement with chicago venture partners
chicago venture partners - sec filing​ reuters staff

text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Jaguar Health Inc:
* JAGUAR HEALTH - ‍ON FEB 26, CO ENTERED SECURITIES PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH CHICAGO VENTURE PARTNERS - SEC FILING​
* JAGUAR HEALTH - ‍ PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT CO ISSUED TO CVP PROMISSORY NOTE IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF $2.2 MILLION FOR PURCHASE PRICE OF $1.6 MILLION
* JAGUAR HEALTH - ‍ALSO ENTERED SECURITY AGREEMENT, PURSUANT TO WHICH CVP WILL RECEIVE SECURITY INTEREST IN SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF CO'S ASSETS​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2HZ8UZU ) Further company coverage:
